FlowGraph
Table of Contents

Namespace FlowGraph.Core.Serialization.Dtos

Classes

EdgeDto

Legacy data transfer object for Edge serialization (Version 1 format). Maintained for backward compatibility when deserializing old files.

EdgeElementDto

Element DTO for Edge type (Version 2 format).

ElementDto

Polymorphic element DTO base class for Version 2 format. Uses "kind" discriminator to identify element type.

GraphDto

Data transfer object for Graph serialization. Version 2 uses polymorphic elements[] array for unified element storage. Version 1 compatibility maintained via separate Nodes/Edges/Shapes lists.

LabelInfoDto

Data transfer object for LabelInfo serialization.

NodeDto

Legacy data transfer object for Node serialization (Version 1 format). Maintained for backward compatibility when deserializing old files.

NodeElementDto

Element DTO for Node type (Version 2 format).

PointDto

Data transfer object for Point serialization.

PortDto

Data transfer object for Port serialization.

ShapeDto

Legacy data transfer object for Shape serialization (Version 1 format). Maintained for backward compatibility when deserializing old files. Supports polymorphic shape types (rectangle, line, text, ellipse).

ShapeElementDto

Element DTO for Shape types (Version 2 format). Supports rectangle, line, text, ellipse shapes.
